{{cpp/thread/shared_lock/title|unlock}}
{{cpp/thread/shared_lock/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++14|1=
void unlock();
}}
{{dcl end}}

Unlocks the associated mutex from shared mode. Effectively calls {{c|mutex()-&gt;unlock_shared()}}.

{{lc|std::system_error}} is thrown if there is no associated mutex or if the mutex is not locked.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
(none)

===Exceptions===
* Any exceptions thrown by {{c|mutex()-&gt;unlock_shared()}}.

* If there is no associated mutex, {{lc|std::system_error}} with an error code of {{lc|std::errc::operation_not_permitted}}.
